metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3250 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The default vhost configuration file in Puppet before 3.6.2 does notinclude the SSLCARevocationCheck directive, which might allow remoteattackers to obtain sensitive information via a revoked certificate when aPuppet master runs with Apache 2.4.

criterions.comment: puppet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
